title: Rito notice me.
body:
Hello :)
I've got given a chat restriction for calling top, then the duo saying they got top when they didn't call anything. I've been unfairly punished and Riot should actually sort their shit out.
#ritoplz

replies.body: If you think you've been unfairly punished, you need to contact [support](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us). They'll look through the case and determine if the punishment was fair, though I'm unsure if they'd revoke it given it's a chat restriction.
